title: pls help recognize typefaces
content:
could anybody help with these typefaces as follow.

 [‹ (x) Ballad by Paul Renner - Ballade (Dieter Steffmann) {David H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004948/http:/typophile.com/node/18315 "Go to previous forum topic") ["dromen (expositie 1)" invitation - Lucida Sans, ??? {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004948/http:/typophile.com/node/18271 "Go to next forum topic")
author: duesiqn

comments.content:
’ [Eunuverse](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004948/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Eunuverse/mudTyper+Weights/)’, by Barry Deck, for ’now’, and so on.  
’ [Carbon](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004948/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=86&dw=376)’, by Anuthin Wongsunkakon, for ’GRADUATE’, and so on.

Dav
